idlastro/coyote/

coyotegraphic.pro


top source CoyoteGraphic

Graphics

result = CoyoteGraphic(routine)

This simple just identifies a routine as a Coyote Graphic routine. It is written primarily so I can identify such routines before I assign a background color to a graphics window.

Parameters

routine

Examples

Used in graphics programs:

IDL> IF CoyoteGraphic() THEN background = 'white'
